profile_positions.description:
PROJECT : Image Validation Api:

• Organization : Cognizant.
• Client : ING
• Role : Lead Developer

Technology Stack: SPRING BOOT, Spring WEB Services, Python, TypeScript.

Description: Image Validation Api is part of the Optical Character Recognition Framework developed for Mortgages Initiation part of the ING Mortgages. It reads the supporting documents attahced for a mortgage application and converts the important text from the Images required for mortgage application processing.


Role & Responsibilities:

• Developing new Features in the Chrome plugin coded in Typescript.
• Maintainence and BugFix / Enhancement analysis of the SpringBoot Webservice.
• Maintainence of Python code base responsible of Optical Character Recognition.
• Participating in Daily Scrum calls, Efforts estimation calls, Design calls and also taking initiative to resolve the issues.
• Supporting production deployments.
• Production Bug Fixes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Associate

profile_positions.title: Development Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT : GLOBAL RATES MANAGEMENT :

•	Organization		: Mphasis Ltd.
•	Client				: JP Morgan Chase (UK)
•	Role     			: Developer

Technology Stack: SPRING Core, SPRING BOOT, Spring WEB Services, Spring Batch.

Description: 
JP Morgan Chase is one of the world’s leading banking corporation. Asset management being one of the major LOB’s where Enterprise Content Management solutions are required to maintain binaries along with metadata.

Global Rates Management is the core application to get rates for all the securities which are under the Agency Lending domain of JPMC. GRM takes market rates from different vendors and calculates the rates for JPMC clients for particular securities.

Role & Responsibilities:

•	Developing Spring Batch Jobs to populate DB tables from Vendor Flat Feed file based on Spring Batch Framework.
•	Developing Rest based services based on the requirements and preparing Unit Test Cases to test the functionality thoroughly.
•	Participating in Daily Scrum calls, Efforts estimation calls, Design calls and also taking initiative to resolve the issues.
•	Supporting production deployments.
•	Production Bug Fixes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT : SCRIBE

•	Organization		: Mphasis Ltd.
•	Client				: JP Morgan Chase (USA)
•	Role     			: Developer

Technology Stack: SPRING Core, SPRING BOOT, Spring WEB Services, Angular JS

Description: 
JP Morgan Chase is one of the world’s leading banking corporation. Asset management being one of the major LOB’s where Enterprise Content Management solutions are required to maintain binaries along with metadata.

Scribe project is a single source of data ingestion into ECM. Refactoring of the design along with enhancements to use latest Angular JS as the front end is currently in progress.

Role & Responsibilities:

•	Developing Rest based services based on the requirements and preparing Unit Test Cases to test the functionality thoroughly.
•	Along with server side code in SPRING Rest Web Services, UI coding in Angular JS.
•	Participating in Daily Scrum calls, Efforts estimation calls, Design calls and also taking initiative to resolve the issues.
•	Production Bug Fixes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
UTILITIES : BULKUPLOADER & EDPI TO ML UTILITY 

•	Organization		: Mphasis Ltd.
•	Client				: JP Morgan Chase (USA)
•	Role     			: Developer

Technology Stack: SPRING Core, SPRING Boot, Spring WEB Services, MarkLogic.

Description: 
JP Morgan Chase is one of the world’s leading banking corporation. Asset management being one of the major LOB’s where Enterprise Content Management solutions are required to maintain binaries along with metadata. 
BulkUploader Utility uploads, updates & delete binaries into Documentum & metadata into ML by calling DockLink services. EDPI to MarkLogic Utility pushes Funds data into ML by calling MarkLogic Rest Services.

Role & Responsibilities:

•	Creation of the utilities along with unit testing.
•	Multi–threading approach implemented for BulkUploader.
•	Worked on MarkLogic REST Endpoints POC and implementation of the same in the utility.
•	EDPI Feed Utility built on SPRING BOOT.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT : DOCKLINK SERVICES

•	Organization		: Mphasis Ltd.
•	Client				: JP Morgan Chase (USA)
•	Role     			: Developer

Technology Stack: SPRING Core, Spring WEB Services, MarkLogic.

Description: 
JP Morgan Chase is one of the world’s leading banking corporation. Asset management being one of the major LOB’s where Enterprise Content Management solutions are required to maintain binaries along with metadata. 
DockLink Services developed as a WEB Services Project to handle request from clients to store & manage documents in Documentum and their corresponding metadata in MarkLogic.

Role & Responsibilities:

•	Discussing the FSD’s, BRD’s and preparing an approach document on the same.
•	Participating in calls with the clients to get the approach document approved.
•	Developing new services based on the requirements and preparing Unit Test Cases to test the functionality thoroughly.
•	Preparing ksh scripts for deployment and after deployment validations.
•	Worked on POC for Boosting Search Query based on attributes mentioned in the request in MarkLogic.
•	Preparing demos for developers of consuming applications and taking changes if any required.
•	Participating in Daily Scrum calls, Efforts estimation calls, Design calls and also taking initiative to resolve the issues.
•	Providing support to the deployment team for major changes during production drop.
•	Providing support to onsite for sanity testing after production drop.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT : DCIS

•	Role     			: Developer

Description: 
Documentum Content Integration Services (DCIS) project is scoped to provide customized web services to other applications to work with Documentum content.

Role & Responsibilities:

•	Discussing the FSD’s, BRD’s and preparing an approach document on the same.
•	Participating in calls with the clients to get the approach document approved.
•	Developing new services based on the requirements and preparing Unit Test Cases to test the functionality thoroughly.
•	Preparing ksh scripts for deployment and after deployment validations.
•	Working on POC for new requirements like Full Text Search, multi Repository support, maintaining register table data in Eh Cache to improve performance of services.
•	Preparing demos for developers of consuming applications and taking changes if any required.
•	Participating in Daily Scrum calls, Efforts estimation calls, Design calls and also taking initiative to resolve the issues.
•	Providing support to the deployment team for major changes during production drop.
•	Providing support to onsite for sanity testing after production drop.
•	Tried to share the all the learning experience with other Teams through knowledge sharing sessions with practical examples based on the actual project implementations.

2. Project : Sales Central (Jan 2013 - May 2014) : 
•	Role				: Developer

Description :
Sales Central is an internal web site for JPMC Sales employees to have all the data required under one platform.

Role & Responsibility:

•	Involved in Flex and Basic Asset attributes discussions. Creating Parent definitions and Content Definitions as per client requirements.
•	Developing Templates, CS Elements and Java code to develop the various functionalities of the web site.
•	Involved in POC to build Asset API code to reduce the use of tags for faster performance while loading assets.
profile_positions.title: Delivery Trainee Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Project : Sales Central (Jan 2013 - JULY 2015) : 
•	Organization			: Mphasis Pvt Ltd.
•	Client				: JP Morgan Chase (UK)
•	Role				: Developer

Technology Stack: Oracle WebCentre Sites, SPRING Core, Spring WEB Services.

Description:

Sales Central is an internal web site for JPMC Sales employees to have all the data required under one platform.

Worked on various sections of the web site like User Favorites, Summary Cards and User Feeds.

Role & Responsibility:

•	Involved in Flex and Basic Asset attributes discussions. Creating Parent definitions and Content Definitions as per client requirements.
•	Developing Templates, CS Elements and Java code to develop the various functionalities of the web site.
•	Involved in POC to build Asset API code to reduce the use of tags for faster performance while loading assets. 
•	Implementing CS-Engage. 
•	Worked on Security Implementations to protect application from Security attacks.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
